title: FS: T-206 Lot of 18 w/ HOFers & SL
author: OriginalTrekkerMike

posts.post_title: FS: T-206 Lot of 18 w/ HOFers & SL
posts.post_content:
I have a nice lot of 18 low grade T-206s for sale.  The following cards are included:

Ames (Portriat)
Bridwell (No Cap)
Clymer
Eddie Collins (HOF)
Dahlen (Boston)
Hoffman (St Louis)
Howell (Portrait)
Lobert
Marquard (HOF, Portrait)
Powers
Quillen
Raymond
Rockenfeld (SL)
Street (Catching)
Street (Portrait)
Waddell (HOF, Pitching)
Waddell (HOF, Portrait)
Wilhelm (Pitching)

The price for the entire lot is $325 including postage and handling.  I accept paypal, check or money order.  Scans are available and can be had by emailing me at [url]METaylor2001@hotmail.com[/url].  Thanks for your time and attention.

Due to the great interest in the lot, I will only be sending out scans to the first five people who responded to the lot at this point.  If I can't work out a deal with them I will continue down the list until I find a buyer.  Thank you all for your interest.
